Posts.Content: I was just diagnosed with having a radial scar after having a stereotactiv breast core biopsy.  I am seeing a surgeon who specializes in breast cancer and oncology.  A few of you have written that you were diagnosed with a radial scar.  I know they will want to remove this.  If you have had this diagnoses and surgery can you share what one should expect.  I understand everyone is dfferent but I am just looking for some information.  Thanks
Posts.Title: Radial scar.... anyone else have?
